author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 19-year-old pregnant woman committed suicide due to dowry harassment in Denkanikottai. The victim, Vasantha, married Kumaravel (25) of Anjetty 8 months ago.

According to sources, Vasantha was married off with 15 sovereigns of gold jewellery. Within days of marriage, Kumaravel and his mother started harassing her for more dowry. Vasantha was in the second trimester, when they refused to take her to the hospital.

Thereafter, she went to her parents’ home to visit the doctor.

According to the complaint, Vasantha was refused entry into her husband’s house and forced to return to her parents’ place.

Despite her phone calls to Kumaravel, he refused to take her back.

Distraught over this, Vasantha consumed pesticide.

She was rushed to the Denkanikottai government hospital and referred to the Dharmapuri Government medical college hospital, where she died.

An RDO inquiry has been ordered into the incident.
title: Pregnant woman commits suicide
